title: Using FindName to find unique names in nameList

content.description: The procedure below is intended to display the index in a list of unique names (nameList) where a particular name (targetName) is found. If targetName is not found in nameList, the code should display 0.
content.question: Which of the following procedure calls can be used to demonstrate that the procedure does NOT work as intended?

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and correct errors in algorithms and programs, including error discovery through testing.
